commitResults.messageTitle: Pull Request: Add LinkCommand and UnlinkCommand Classes Description Implements the foundational LinkCommand and UnlinkCommand classes to support linking/unlinking clients to vendors by index. This is the first incremental step towards the full link/unlink feature specified in the MVP.
commitResults.messageBody:
Changes Made
✅ Created LinkCommand.java with:

Command word: link
Parameters: client:INDEX, vendor:INDEX
Success/error messages as per feature specification
Index validation for both client and vendor
✅ Created UnlinkCommand.java with:

Command word: unlink
Parameters: client:INDEX, vendor:INDEX
Success/error messages as per feature specification
Index validation for both client and vendor

Implementation Details
Both commands extend the Command abstract class following existing patterns
Use Index objects for type-safe index handling
Validate indexes against filtered person list
Include TODO comments for future linking logic (requires Person class modifications)
Implement equals() and toString() for testing support
Add pull request template
Add type/ to specify client or vendor
Add command price

Resolved conflicts by:
- Keeping vendor/client distinction for wedding dates (vendors don't have wedding dates)
- Adding partner field from master (clients require partners, vendors cannot have partners)
- Using appropriate Person constructors based on type
- Merging test cases for both features

- Initialize partner field in vendor constructors
- Remove duplicate test method parse_vendorWithWeddingDate_failure
